DOC.brief_title: Tooth Bleaching Young Patients Using Hydrogen Peroxide-based Gel
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , control , clinical trial conduct 53 patient age 11 24 year allocate group base use follow commercial product : Whiteness HP - FGM® ( 35 % hydrogen peroxide ) ; Whiteness HP Blue Calcium - FGM® ( 35 % hydrogen peroxide ) ; Whiteness HP Blue Calcium - FGM® ( 20 % hydrogen peroxide ) . After bleach procedure , visual analog scale use measure tooth sensitivity classic Vita® scale use determine change tooth color . Statistical analysis involve Friedman , Kruskal-Wallis Student-Newman-Keuls test , p-value ≤ 0.05 ≤ 0.0001 consider indicative statistical significance .
DOC.criteria: Individuals age 11 24 year diagnosis tooth discoloration sign statement inform consent . Individuals dentofacial anomaly , without permanent dentition complete second molar , orthodontic orthopedic treatment jaw , take medication could alter tooth color previously submit tooth bleach
